page.title: 16Richard's Saturday
page.content: On Saturday morning at 11.00 I got out of bed and looked out of the window. It was nice so I ran down the stairs and made my breakfast. After breakfast I got dressed and went out to play. Two hours later it was dinner time. We had scrambled egg on toast and for pudding we had cheesecake. After dinner I went back outside to play on my go-cart. Later, all the family went for a walk in the wood.We took an hour over the walk. When we came back it was tea-time.We had sandwich spread on toast. After tea I went outside for half an hour. I came in for a bath,and after my bath I watched television. At 8pm. it was my bedtime. I read for a short while before going to sleep.Then my big sister came to bed and woke me up.
